[ignoreSchemaField?](./node-core-library.ijsonschemavalidateobjectwithoptions.ignoreschemafield.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, the root-level `$schema` property in a JSON object being validated will be ignored during validation. If this is set to `true` and the schema requires a `$schema` property, validation will fail.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
